# Sling Data

INGESTION

Sling Data is a modern data integration platform that enables seamless data movement across various sources and destinations. It offers robust ETL capabilities, real-time data streaming, and transformation tools to ensure data is always accessible and up-to-date. With its intuitive interface and extensive connector library, Sling Data simplifies the process of integrating and managing complex data pipelines.

## Sling Data + MotherDuck

Sling Data integrates with MotherDuck by leveraging its comprehensive connector library to facilitate seamless data transfer and synchronization between various data sources and the MotherDuck cloud data warehouse. This integration allows users to efficiently load, transform, and query data within MotherDuck, utilizing DuckDB's powerful analytical capabilities.
